translation.zh:
‎我觉得你在问我：

translation.zh: ‎是的 我可以告诉你 爱是一种感觉

translation.en: like electric waves in an organism.
translation.zh: ‎就像生物体中的电波

translation.zh: ‎它的工作方式是两极互相吸引

translation.zh: ‎当我听到年轻夫妻的告解时

translation.zh: ‎我问了他们一个问题 ‎“你们陪孩子们一起玩吗？”

translation.zh: ‎弗朗西丝卡 你要拍照还是干嘛？

translation.zh: ‎我叫马丁·斯科塞斯 今年79岁

translation.en: -[young Francesca] I see you. -If I move back, you follow me?
translation.zh:
‎-我看到你了
‎-如果我退后 你就跟着我？

translation.en: -[young Francesca] Uh-huh. -Come forward.
translation.zh: ‎过来吧

translation.en: I'm a… a filmmaker from New York.
translation.zh: ‎我是一名纽约的电影人

translation.en: Now, are you gonna go up, and I can give you a-- read you a story?
translation.zh:
‎现在 你想上楼吗？
‎我可以给你读一个故事

translation.en: [young Francesca] Uh-huh, yeah, but, Daddy, I want to take a picture of this
translation.zh: ‎对 但是爸爸 我想给这头牛…拍照

translation.en: -How's this? -[young Francesca] Good.
translation.zh: ‎这样怎么样？ ‎很好

translation.en: [Martin] I'm a father to three daughters.
translation.zh: ‎我是三个女儿的父亲

translation.en: Catherine, Domenica, and Francesca.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟琳、多梅尼卡和弗朗西丝卡

translation.en: What was the example of love that your parents gave you?
translation.zh:
‎关于你父母给你的爱
‎有什么例子吗？

translation.en: My mother was very strong.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我妈妈很强势

translation.en: Uh, you know, um, my father was very stern,
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我妈妈很强势 ‎我父亲很严厉

translation.en: really trying to uphold the old traditions.
translation.zh: ‎他真的在努力维护过去的传统

translation.en: And there was a lot of tension.
translation.zh: ‎家里气氛非常紧张

translation.en: I was in the middle of every discussion, good, bad, indifferent.
translation.zh:
‎我每次都在争论的中央
‎有好有坏 我不关心

translation.en: But I think they were tied together somehow,
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得他们某种程度上
‎是连结在一起的

translation.en: in a… a…
It's beyond words or emotions.
translation.zh:
‎-它超越了语言和情感
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: -Really? -They were tied together in the spirit.
translation.zh:
‎-它超越了语言和情感
‎-真的吗？ ‎他们的灵魂连结在一起

translation.en: Lovey-dovey, sort of, you know.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 有点太肉麻了

translation.en: They say, "As you get older, your love grows stronger."
translation.zh:
‎他们说随着你们年龄的增长
‎你们的爱也会更坚韧

translation.en: So, for some reason, it is getting a little stronger, you know.
translation.zh:
‎所以出于某种原因
‎它变得更坚韧了 知道吗？

translation.en: Right, Daddy?
translation.zh: ‎对吧 孩子他爸？

translation.en: -He's bashful. -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: ‎他脸红了 ‎对 我知道

translation.en: Yeah, it was definitely a spiritual bond that, uh, I can't describe.
translation.zh: ‎对 这绝对是一种精神纽带… ‎是… ‎我无法形容的

translation.en: [Francesca] Do you think you and mom have that kind of connection?
translation.zh: ‎（海伦 马丁的妻子） ‎你以为你和我妈妈有那种联系吗？

translation.en: [Martin] Yeah, I think so. I think so.
translation.zh: ‎对 我觉得是 ‎我觉得是

translation.en: I turn around, it's been 24 years.
translation.zh: ‎我回头一看 已经过去24年了

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎真美

translation.en: Mac, come here.
translation.zh: ‎麦克 过来

translation.zh: ‎过来 宝贝 来吧！ ‎到这边来！它去找你了

translation.en: And he goes to you. [groans]
translation.zh: ‎到这边来！它去找你了

translation.en: [inhales] Ah, there you are, my dear.
translation.zh: ‎你在这儿呢 亲爱的

translation.en: It's you.
translation.zh: ‎是你

translation.en: [Francesca] Do you remember your first date with my mom?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得你跟我妈的第一次约会吗？

translation.en: [Martin] Yeah, it was in my mid-fifties, so a whole life had gone by.
translation.zh:
‎记得 我当时都年过半百了
‎所以半辈子都过去了

translation.en: -[Francesca] Mm. -[Martin] I had two beautiful daughters.
translation.zh: ‎我有两个漂亮的女儿

translation.en: But the marriages to their mothers had ended.
translation.zh: ‎但我和她们母亲的婚姻已经结束了

translation.en: There was something missing.
translation.zh: ‎我总觉得生活中缺了些什么

translation.en: And that day, she said, "I'd like to take you to a special place."
translation.zh:
‎然后那天她说：
‎“我想带你去一个特别的地方”

translation.en: It was called the Jardin Majorelle, in Marrakech.
translation.zh: ‎在马拉喀什 它被称为马若雷勒花园

translation.en: And the walls and the chairs
translation.zh: ‎那里的墙壁 、椅子和所有的东西

translation.en: and all of the objects, uh, painted this, uh, shade of a deep blue.
translation.zh: ‎那里的墙壁 、椅子和所有的东西 ‎都涂成了深蓝色

translation.en: It was really unlike anything I'd experienced before.
translation.zh: ‎这跟我以前旅游的经历完全不同

translation.en: And it was kind of magical.
translation.zh: ‎那里真的很神奇

translation.en: And something kind of changed.
translation.zh: ‎而且我内心的有些东西彻底改变了

translation.en: A year later, we're in New York, we're hanging, we're living together,
translation.zh: ‎一年后 ‎我们在纽约 住在了一起

translation.en: and we found out we were able to have a child.
translation.zh: ‎我们发现我们还能生孩子

translation.en: And then you came!
translation.zh: ‎然后就有了你！

translation.en: -This was a shock. -[Francesca] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎这太震惊了 ‎对

translation.en: And then... it has to move. We have to do it.
translation.zh: ‎然后… ‎生活必须继续 我们必须这样

translation.en: We've got to take care of your mom, take care of you. There's a.... [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我们得照顾好你妈妈 照顾好你…

translation.en: -Chaos! [chuckles] -[laughing] Chaos! You know, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-混乱！
‎-太混乱了 ‎你知道的 对

translation.en: Nice and peaceful.
translation.zh: ‎睡得真香

translation.en: At that age, I couldn't have imagined my life could change that much.
translation.zh:
‎到了我那个年纪
‎我没想到生活还能发生如此大的改变

translation.en: [woman, in Spanish] When you are a mother, and you have the blessing
translation.zh:
‎如果你是一位母亲
‎还有福气能够生孩子

translation.en: of having a child born, the love is immense.
translation.zh:
‎如果你是一位母亲
‎还有福气能够生孩子 ‎这份母爱将是巨大的

translation.en: It grows as years pass.
translation.zh: ‎会随着岁月的流逝而增长

translation.en: Every day you care more for your children. You love them more.
translation.zh:
‎每一天你都会更关心你的孩子
‎更爱他们

translation.en: My name is Estela Barnes de Carlotto.
translation.zh:
‎（埃斯特拉·巴内斯·德·卡洛托
‎90岁） ‎我叫埃斯特拉·巴内斯·德·卡洛托

translation.en: I was born in Buenos Aires, the capital city.
translation.zh: ‎我出生在阿根廷首都布宜诺斯艾利斯

translation.en: I am 90 years old, a little bit more.
translation.zh: ‎我90岁 还不止

translation.en: I am President of the Grandmothers of the Plaza de Mayo Association… GERARDO DISAPPEARED MY SON AND DAUGHTER-IN-LAW ARE KIDNAPPED
translation.zh: ‎我是梅奥广场祖母协会的主席

translation.en: …which has been in existence for almost 44 years.
translation.zh: ‎我们协会已经存在了将近44年

translation.en: A coup d'état, an atrocious military dictatorship,
translation.zh:
‎通过一次政变
‎残暴的军事独裁政权上台

translation.en: 30,000 disappeared, dead, political prisoners,
translation.zh:
‎造成三万人失踪、死亡
‎作为政治犯被关押

translation.en: children that we still have not been able to recover.
translation.zh: ‎还有至今不能从中恢复的孩子们

translation.en: [all] Justice! Justice! Justice! Justice! Justice!
translation.zh: ‎正义！

translation.en: [Estela] The civil-military dictatorship kidnapped the oldest of my four daughters, Laura,
translation.zh:
‎独裁政府绑架了
‎我四个女儿中的长女 劳拉

translation.en: who was six months pregnant,
translation.zh: ‎她当时怀有六个月的身孕

translation.en: and spent nine months in a clandestine detention center,
translation.zh: ‎在一个秘密拘禁所被关押了九个月

translation.en: where her little son was born,
translation.zh: ‎她的小儿子就是在那儿出生的

translation.en: and he was stolen the same day he was born.
translation.zh: ‎他在出生那天就被偷走了

translation.en: She was pretty, wasn't she? Thin. She was very thin.
translation.zh: ‎她很漂亮 对吧？很苗条 ‎她很苗条

translation.en: She was murdered,
translation.zh: ‎她被谋杀了

translation.en: and her body was given to me by special request.
translation.zh: ‎通过特别请求 她的尸体 ‎才被交给我

translation.en: But I swore before her grave
translation.zh: ‎但我在她的墓前 ‎发过誓

translation.en: that I would not stop, not even for a day…
translation.zh: ‎在为她和她的同志们讨回公道

translation.en: WE ARE LOOKING FOR TWO GENERATIONS
translation.zh: ‎为她找到儿子之前

translation.en: …seeking justice for her and her comrades, and looking for her little son.
translation.zh: ‎为她找到儿子之前 ‎我一天都不会停歇

translation.en: RESTITUTION OF MISSING CHILDREN TO THEIR FAMILIES
translation.zh: ‎我一天都不会停歇

translation.zh:
‎-你很爱你的罗莎奶奶
‎-是的

translation.zh:
‎-你很爱你的罗莎奶奶
‎-是的 ‎你和她的关系怎么样？

translation.en: [Pope Francis] Like a child with his grandmother, you know?
translation.zh: ‎我们俩就像亲祖孙一样 知道吗？

translation.en: Sweet.
translation.zh: ‎很有爱

translation.en: But what touches me the most about her…
translation.zh: ‎但她最让我感动的是…

translation.en: If I had to describe Grandma Rosa in one word, it would be "silence."
translation.zh:
‎如果我要用一个词描述罗莎奶奶
‎那就是“安静”

translation.en: She would accompany us, caress us.
translation.zh: ‎她会陪伴我们、关照我们…

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: ‎你懂的

translation.en: But she always…
translation.zh: ‎但她总是…

translation.en: had those moments of silence.
translation.zh: ‎会有很多安静的时刻

translation.en: She was a woman of patience. And she suffered a lot. A lot.
translation.zh:
‎她是个很有耐心的女人
‎她过去受了很多苦 很多苦

translation.en: [man, in Italian] To me, love is returning life to people,
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 爱就是在拯救自己的同时

translation.en: as well as returning life to myself.
translation.zh: ‎也拯救他人的生命

translation.en: My name is Vito Fiorino,
translation.zh: ‎我叫维托·菲奥里诺

translation.en: I'm 72 years old, and I live in Lampedusa.
translation.zh: ‎我72岁了 ‎我住在兰佩杜萨

translation.en: I'm an ice-cream maker.
translation.zh: ‎我是做冰淇淋的

translation.en: On the night of October 3rd, 2013,
translation.zh: ‎在2013年10月3日晚上

translation.en: together with seven friends,
translation.zh: ‎和七个朋友一起

translation.en: we had decided to go out to sea because the sea was beautiful,
translation.zh:
‎我们决定要出海
‎因为那天的大海很美

translation.en: and it was windy.
translation.zh: ‎没有什么风…

translation.en: I looked through the porthole, as the sun was starting to rise,
translation.zh: ‎太阳出来的时候 我从舷窗望出去

translation.en: and I saw this dreadful view in front of me.
translation.zh: ‎我看到了面前可怕的悲剧

translation.en: At least 200 people at sea, asking for help.
translation.zh: ‎海上至少有200人 ‎在向我们呼救

translation.en: They were screaming and screaming.
translation.zh: ‎他们在尖叫呼喊

translation.en: [anchorwoman, in Italian] The worst immigration tragedy
translation.zh: ‎这是地中海兰佩杜萨附近海域

translation.en: in the Mediterranean Sea, in the waters off the island of Lampedusa.
translation.zh: ‎这是地中海兰佩杜萨附近海域 ‎最严重的移民悲剧

translation.en: The casualties could be hundreds.
translation.zh: ‎伤亡人数可能达到几百人

translation.en: They were Eritrean and Somalian refugees fleeing their country.
translation.zh:
‎他们是逃离祖国的
‎厄立特里亚和索马里难民

translation.en: They were on a boat which sank a few meters off Conigli Beach.
translation.zh:
‎他们乘坐了一条
‎沉没在科尼格利海滩附近的船上

translation.en: [Vito] With my boat, I saved 47 castaways,
translation.zh: ‎我用我的船 ‎救了47个沉船漂泊人

translation.en: and since that night, my life has changed.
translation.zh: ‎从那晚开始 我的人生就改变了

translation.en: When I first moved to Lampedusa, I was 51 years old.
translation.zh: ‎我刚搬来兰佩杜萨的时候51岁

translation.en: I had already been separated for many years,
translation.zh: ‎当时我已经和妻子分开很多年了

translation.en: and my children were already grown up.
translation.zh: ‎我的孩子们也都已经长大了

translation.en: I don't remember receiving a kiss from my parents.
translation.zh: ‎我不记得收到过我父母亲的吻

translation.en: This turned me into someone who was incapable, as a father…
translation.zh: ‎这让我成为了一名不合格的父亲…

translation.en: of giving a kiss or caress to my children.
translation.zh:
‎作为父亲
‎我从没给过我的孩子一个吻或者爱抚

translation.en: And I managed.
translation.zh: ‎最后我做到了

translation.en: I managed with these kids
translation.zh: ‎我安抚了… ‎那些获救的孩子

translation.en: because the youngest I rescued was 13 years old.
translation.zh: ‎那些获救的孩子 ‎我救上来最小的孩子才13岁

translation.en: We've created a family bond.
translation.zh: ‎我们建立了家庭的纽带

translation.en: There's a sense of being somehow a father to these kids.
translation.zh:
‎我面对这些孩子
‎有一种做父亲的感觉

translation.zh: ‎你好 维托 ‎嗨 曼纽尔

translation.zh: ‎瑞森 你好吗？

translation.zh: ‎我很好 你呢？

translation.zh:
‎我真的很高兴能再次见到
‎你们所有人 我是说…

translation.zh: ‎他们比我聪明 会说一些意大利语

translation.zh: ‎总有一天 我们要教你提格里尼亚语

translation.zh: ‎我尽量试试

translation.en: [in Italian] Ambassanger is saying that we always talk about you,
translation.zh: ‎大使说我们总是提到你

translation.en: and you always have a place in our hearts.
translation.zh: ‎你会永远在我们心中

translation.en: Thank you, Vito. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 维托 太谢谢你了

translation.en: I love you. Bye.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你们 再见

translation.en: Thank you. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 再见

translation.zh: ‎我救起来的其中一位 塔德斯

translation.en: is coming to visit me here in Lampedusa
translation.zh: ‎明天要来兰佩杜萨这儿来看我

translation.en: to try and overcome that difficult moment together.
translation.zh: ‎看看我们能不能一起走出那场悲剧

translation.en: [in Spanish] Laura, in college,
translation.zh: ‎劳拉在大学里

translation.en: became a member of the Peronist University Youth.
translation.zh: ‎成为了佩庇隆大学青年社团的一员

translation.en: [crowd chanting] …we are going to win. We are going to win this fight.
translation.zh:
‎…我们会赢的
‎我们会赢得这场斗争

translation.en: [Estela] And there were street demonstrations and marches.
translation.zh: ‎当年还有很多街头游行和抗议

translation.en: The youth of the 1970s wanted a change.
translation.zh: ‎70年代的年轻人想要改变

translation.en: We were witnesses, night and day,
translation.zh: ‎最主要的是 他们没日没夜地

translation.en: to the kidnappings of students above all, and anyone who complained.
translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎每次有人叫我出海

translation.en: I would always find an excuse to decline.
translation.zh: ‎我总能找到拒绝的理由

translation.en: Today, with Tadese, I managed to gather up the courage.
translation.zh: ‎今天 我和塔德斯一起鼓足了勇气

translation.en: Now, the landings are nonstop.
translation.zh: ‎现在 各种各样的船不停靠岸

translation.en: People reach Lampedusa in huge numbers,
translation.zh:
‎大量游客坐着橡皮艇和小船…
‎各型的轮船

translation.en: on rubber dinghies, boats, all sorts of vessels.
translation.zh: ‎到达了兰佩杜萨岛

translation.en: This is the spot where you were.
translation.zh: ‎这是你之前所在的地方

translation.en: If you believe your life matters as much as anyone else's life…
translation.zh:
‎如果你相信自己的生命
‎和别人的生命一样重要…

translation.en: you cannot refuse to help.
translation.zh: ‎你就不能拒绝帮忙

translation.en: [Pope Francis, in Spanish] There is a very beautiful alpine song.
translation.zh: ‎有一首很美的阿尔卑斯山歌

translation.en: "In the art of climbing, what matters is not to avoid falling
translation.zh:
‎“在攀岩的艺术中
‎重要的不是避免跌落

translation.en: but not to remain fallen."
translation.zh: ‎而是不能一直下坠”

translation.en: There’s always someone to take your hand, isn’t there?
translation.zh: ‎而且总会有人抓住你的手的 对吧？

translation.en: Looking at this another way
translation.zh: ‎以另一种方式看待

translation.en: is the only rightful way of seeing a person in full.
translation.zh: ‎是完整看清一个人的唯一正确方式

translation.en: When you help them up.
translation.zh: ‎当你帮助他们的时候

translation.en: It's not fair to look at someone any other way.
translation.zh: ‎对他们另眼相看

translation.en: It's not human.
translation.zh: ‎是不公平的 是不人性的

translation.en: If you want to love, you cannot be indifferent.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想去爱 就不能无动于衷

translation.en: You need to look more closely,
translation.zh: ‎你需要看得更仔细

translation.en: reaching the limits of human pain.
translation.zh: ‎看得更仔细 到达人类痛苦的极限

translation.en: [Estela, in Spanish] For 36 years,
translation.zh: ‎36年来

translation.en: I was denied the opportunity to love my grandson and to be loved by him.
translation.zh: ‎我都被剥夺了我和外孙之间爱的机会

translation.en: And one day,
translation.zh: ‎有一天

translation.en: finally, after 36 years…
translation.zh: ‎终于在36年后…

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: ‎你好！

translation.en: …they called me on the phone
translation.zh: ‎…他们打电话给我

translation.en: and told me that they had found my grandson!
translation.zh: ‎告诉我他们找到了我的外孙！

translation.en: It was the joy of…
translation.zh: ‎对我和我的家人来说…

translation.en: of something very important for me and for my family
translation.zh: ‎那是难以形容的喜悦

translation.en: because Laura came back with him.
translation.zh: ‎因为劳拉也跟他一起回来了

translation.en: Laura is still present in him.
translation.zh: ‎在他身上能看到劳拉的影子

translation.en: And he can only imagine her
translation.zh: ‎他只能想象她的模样

translation.en: and dream of her.
translation.zh: ‎在梦里梦见到母亲

translation.en: [man, in Spanish] Holy Father, let's change the subject and talk about dreams.
translation.zh: ‎教皇 让我们换个话题 谈论一下梦想

translation.en: A person who is not capable of dreaming
translation.zh: ‎一个无法做梦的人

translation.en: is missing something.
translation.zh: ‎是不完整的

translation.en: They are a sterile person.
translation.zh: ‎是一个灵魂贫瘠的人

translation.en: And sterility is fine for operating rooms, but not for life.
translation.zh:
‎对于手术室来说还好
‎但是对于生活

translation.en: ♪ I can get everything everywhere ♪
translation.zh: ‎字幕翻译：Jack
